title: Does Wayland Really Break Everything?
description:
We've discussed Probono's  infamous Boycott Wayland post many a times but recently Nate Graham put out a blog post that I think you must read with an open mind because this post reframes the problem in a way that's more in line with how we generally think about these sorts of compatibility issues.
